name:
THEATRHYTHM FINAL
FANTASY CURTAIN CALL
description:
Offers in-game purchases

Tap Into a Timeless Legacy of Music!

A sequel to the first FINAL FANTASY rhythm action game, THEATRHYTHM FINAL FANTASY CURTAIN CALL™ expands on the original in every way with new gameplay modes, 221 songs, and over 60 playable characters. Featuring music that spans the full breadth of the storied FINAL FANTASY franchise, players tap along to the memorable beats and harmonies as the adorable, stylized characters battle and quest through their worlds. The music of over 20 titles is brought together in one package, fusing together the moving scores, cinematic visuals, and role-playing elements the series is known for.
disclaimer:
Due to the size of this game, it may take longer to download the digital version of this title when compared to other Nintendo eShop games. At the time of purchase you can choose either “Download Now” to begin to download the game immediately or “Download Later” to download the game when the system enters “sleep mode.”

You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.

In-game content available for purchase using stored account funds.
